name: ABCD - Can You Detect Me?
description: Classifying skin lesions using machine learning. By extracting key ABCD features, our classification techniques aim to detect melanoma and non-melanoma skin cancers early.

name: Deny and Conquer
description: Deny and Conquer is a competitive multiplayer game where players aim to claim territory on an 8x8 grid by coloring squares. The application follows a client-server architecture with token based messaging scheme.

name: RainbowPal - cmd-f 2025
description: A health tracking app designed for the LGBTQ+ community, featuring AI-powered companionship, medication reminders, and mental health support in an inclusive, user-friendly interface.

name: Easy As Pie
description: A front-end recipe platform that transforms cooking discovery into an engaging experience. Users can explore diverse cuisines, plan meals, and navigate recipes tailored to their expertise level through an intuitive, API-driven interface.
